constantValues: Generic activity representing work needed to be done.

definitions.description: Generic activity representing work needed to be done.

members.name: subject

constantValues: Type a short description about the objective or primary topic of the task.

members.description: Type a short description about the objective or primary topic of the task.

members.name: actualEnd

constantValues: Enter the actual end date and time of the task. By default, it displays when the activity was completed or canceled.

members.description: Enter the actual end date and time of the task. By default, it displays when the activity was completed or canceled.

members.name: scheduledStart

constantValues: Enter the expected due date and time.

members.description: Enter the expected due date and time.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'KnowledgeArticle and Account and KnowledgeBaseRecord and Contact' adds the 'regardingObjectId' attribute below to the 'Task' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: regardingObjectId

constantValues: Choose the record that the task relates to.

value.description: Choose the record that the task relates to.

members.name: scheduledDurationMinutes

constantValues: Scheduled duration of the task, specified in minutes.

members.description: Scheduled duration of the task, specified in minutes.

members.name: actualStart

constantValues: Enter the actual start date and time for the task. By default, it displays when the task was created.

members.description: Enter the actual start date and time for the task. By default, it displays when the task was created.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User and Team' adds the 'ownerId' attribute below to the 'Task' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: ownerId

constantValues: Enter the user or team who is assigned to manage the record. This field is updated every time the record is assigned to a different user.

value.description: Enter the user or team who is assigned to manage the record. This field is updated every time the record is assigned to a different user.

members.name: stateCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'Task' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
arguments.name: stateCode_display

constantValues: Shows whether the task is open, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled tasks are read-only and can't be edited.

members.description: Shows whether the task is open, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled tasks are read-only and can't be edited.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Activity' adds the 'activityId' attribute below to the 'Task' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

members.name: category

constantValues: Type a category to identify the task type, such as lead gathering or customer follow up, to tie the task to a business group or function.

members.description: Type a category to identify the task type, such as lead gathering or customer follow up, to tie the task to a business group or function.

members.name: createdOn

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'BusinessUnit' adds the 'owningBusinessUnit' attribute below to the 'Task' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: owningBusinessUnit

constantValues: Shows the record owner's business unit.

value.description: Shows the record owner's business unit.

members.name: isWorkflowCreated

constantValues: Information which specifies if the task was created from a workflow rule.

members.description: Information which specifies if the task was created from a workflow rule.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User' adds the 'createdBy' attribute below to the 'Task' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User' adds the 'modifiedBy' attribute below to the 'Task' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: modifiedBy

constantValues: Shows who last updated the record.

value.description: Shows who last updated the record.

members.name: subcategory

constantValues: Type a subcategory to identify the task type and relate the activity to a specific product, sales region, business group, or other function.

members.description: Type a subcategory to identify the task type and relate the activity to a specific product, sales region, business group, or other function.

members.name: scheduledEnd

constantValues: Enter the expected due date and time.

members.description: Enter the expected due date and time.

members.name: description

constantValues: Type additional information to describe the task.

members.description: Type additional information to describe the task.

members.name: percentComplete

constantValues: Type the percentage complete value for the task to track tasks to completion.

members.description: Type the percentage complete value for the task to track tasks to completion.

members.name: priorityCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.name: priorityCode_display

constantValues: Select the priority so that preferred customers or critical issues are handled quickly.

members.description: Select the priority so that preferred customers or critical issues are handled quickly.

members.name: versionNumber
members.description: Version number of the task.

members.name: actualDurationMinutes

constantValues: Type the number of minutes spent on the task. The duration is used in reporting.

members.description: Type the number of minutes spent on the task. The duration is used in reporting.

members.name: modifiedOn

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

arguments.name: statusCode_display

members.description: Information which specifies whether the task was billed as part of resolving a case.

arguments.name: addedAttribute

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.
